Title: Watching the Detectives
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Graham Yost, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Nichelle D. Tramble (executive story editor), Ingrid Escajeda (story), Ryan Farley (story), Jon Worley (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Quarles and Duffy kill Gary Hawkins and try to frame Raylan for his death, while also getting the FBI on his tail. Meanwhile, Quarles raises the stakes in his war with Boyd Crowder, and Ellstin Limehouse tries to decide whose side he's on.
